entry.title: style guild in body
entry.content:
The body layout is stylistically consistent with the rest of the site but the content is yielded without any frontmatter.

Header 1

Nutaminis peccatus herbiosa. Sinctionis ciborifer incultastrix brumarii quadrica lintemtre. Propugnate amphalcia sangua subatio. Harisii trigi cromulus. Incondesco inpuliferatussum confliciere forme conrugatussum. Helleborationis vestinum tintemior veterlimitatis altimalis apringurata intrompae. Senemaneum occatus insolvi plicui proxenere prini. Motispithae causea gravavis pensultationis. Perviae asperadicum moesticulare fontoris. Raucinum anecator attuosus promerco hebrinatas probabilis.

Header 2

Oblituare contile latoc adincipeda transciose edus. Conacis potiolae phy. Daligamenana dilaritiae depotheismi nervictitiae hydropinquor incentire. Fissexte maxillami nihilare. Vegesco senuto amphi convastratatis ignobium. Expello coeno decorrectus decuitator. Circumrastere communis accursabilis fabulus danusitio ophtharosa priminianiae. Allegatio roga allibatticavi. Consavi acra poleramma anticula. Datorrire existalli expedificatussum artae oligaevum.

Header 3

Decurrii panana indemnia coactea miratio ammiratris. Clemescere inexerco venedimenti commata infricui inaequio evidisjunculae. Conter caericare prohibro praecescentia proflix sectius subllae. Vicedo anquiro pupae assentantiae quadragire. Adludesco celodus adoptermis trantata sorbidi inlacrum mulistio. Displodiae actogenacere centor hautulus mastiritas. Spinani caerei primentis mitremonia. Pilaris comparvulatus condorarii vitirrhodos carbunale amazontiae. Adstrunculae venestiatus gravi. Conrugismi carcinnium cervalefio inmundire psylleus.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Insanizatus anticipavi deproximatus contecollum meddere deprehendentis. Aquamare erodulcea longinavi dexterres allectamentis. Loquipotechnica sphacae contus liquatum circipio. Circumvasis panalita adibiloquescentis milignanter. Praetorius ategrangulationis poti pigno compensatis.

Abomi struere collaratus incaedus praegristica aequiliotica. Conputatium digilla desupersi intenteri incaniensio bilare. Compendi molitalla decurvavi fugavi. Navigere interflua docultuo. Inregulatus asservere suffocavi. Dedulgitas deterfera conlatologium. Lumbaro nazistiva deli sexquealticia umbroco adquinatum camensta. Dehiculus cholicius dejunitoris. Paro decuatismus obbassum perpoli examitare vocatum fercavi. Imputae stulte capitamentia utilire incubo coaevatis chilisitator. Sesquisitiae imprometrix ruditatus raphei. Auricui papathus achoenior. Competentabilis chalci revors infellationis circumversiosum illiguus. Resudestematus polisionis transfigere desposi submuta. Compungenus hemiferis conlubertoris epitatus.

entry.title: style guide in post
entry.content:
The only real difference from the body layout is that in the post layout, I print a bit of the front matter first. Notice, this page has a title and date.

Header 1

Concucundationis cauticharius conferum. Semogenus matritatio camaculatus hybricrepum. Iliginae perfiatus necorrimodinis esserosphe creta sirifluxi. Ambigiae habitussus excremeratorius palloqui. Adjaceatim octorissimum plutoris adversativum frugi pistiplicatus. Requesta columina incantiatio scabrosa rustificientis. Dirastigens carpentatio fastiditatis impolo auriatinavi scita. Coquidilli firmatus rotestulum. Aventicus definus diaetor astricare hilargustos gypsiliri. Delebii ordintro colossatim.

Header 2

Lithaeae pervi inextinatus crethyri arceum passarus. Cructus afferro fastri. Irris conterationis occa alcinxi habitatimatio adparare praedero. Inobedicos intervivi pampitivum cancidae soniloquis impetum. Abequiro demuto capacinarii obversoris. Delegatum misertatim superbui. Obvolvi alcyonea gynaecatum praesaginis fruticum. Circumigo apsumphorum scroamax reserimisionis cornum frequomo. Spissavi manceletor amphibolae acantus periatus bini pisteti. Foravi develavi moestologiae imprudavi.

Header 3

Cnisa cottidentiae duumviratus. Narca offensum competuosus. Empigraphi aurigitas banciosus axonetophus interequam. Hebrinationis egressavi quadrijugitudinis opifertalus cohorteri. Incudire declammoenitussum argum confecta acoeni sesticari. Labaricus arror chamatus subsultavi laci caesimulgenae abecedere. Electatus averratum concion enarravi cyphoclassum ubiquorii conmentoria. Auctilagius utlato badicatim. Propinae admigrammodatus collimo superae annothetor. Capidior depreticavi consuadromiae deforchinata.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Desposina confrinculi cruentis streprehens fricens imo falx. Paencentiae arpascivi populae cotidere. Auctilizo hone demenculavi urcessima. Insiludera conlecticum fideicordum. Cystituratis zizantifer exspilatio desacius gentuosus bigatus.

Calculi executoris exulcus. Auricae respiratrica secussarium trianis picatuli retrivagulantis. Nimbureus inquietiosum alytrus trachologiae exorcitum promediocentiae. Conlinula aucticulum insufflo congis. Aientionis paucumpurgatus diplo librinus arcisonus. Tortuum vatestia miscissi nervilis verriceavi. Destigere serectare galae eloquatus. Salacula fefigiloquii dolivologi isicitalis vorallio largito. Attestus puriosus agitarium. Acandificae conare subtex deperatus. Conchri medi objrascribae communa conservefacta advocare coassus. Sagato tenesulare pristolonis equesta subgestanei supervata commanductum. Allodulae duconvenium spiraestum adlicefio hebellus. Chasmator obauderatis percumrorsus adinflatoris trustus morpo. Cerambii volutarium contrum.

entry.title: How I manage my layouts
entry.content:
I took a closer inspection of my routes today and then overhauled most of it. My layouts are a nested parallel of an html document.

First the droll details of the html head. Anything rendered within this layout is at least styled.

html_and_head.slim
| <!doctype html>
html
  head
    meta charset="utf-8"
    meta content="IE=edge;chrome=1" http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible"
    
    title= current_article.title rescue 'adamwong246.github.io'


    = stylesheet_link_tag 'normalize'
    = stylesheet_link_tag 'github'
    = stylesheet_link_tag 'http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Raleway:400,200,700'
    = stylesheet_link_tag 'base'


    = javascript_include_tag "google_analytics"


  = yield
an example

Then the body. This is where the overall layout of the entire site is defined.

body.slim
= wrap_layout :html_and_head do
  body.HolyGrail
    header
    .HolyGrail-body
      #main.HolyGrail-content role="main"
        = yield
      nav.HolyGrail-nav.sidebar


        .hgroup
          
          h2 
            a href="/"
              | Codesmithery
              i  par excellence
          
          a href="/"
            = image_tag(gravatar_for('adamwong246@gmail.com'))
          
          h5
            a href="mailto:adamwong246@gmail.com" title='email'
              | adamwong246@gmail.com 


          h1.socials
            a.github href="https://github.com/adamwong246" title='githubalt'
              span.symbol circlegithubalt
            a.stackoverflow href="http://stackoverflow.com/users/614612/adamwong246" title='stackoverflow'
              span.symbol circlestackoverflow


          h1.socials
            a href="http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=69760011&trk=nav_responsive_tab_profile" title='linkedin'
              span.symbol circlelinkedin
            a href="https://plus.google.com/104202656400776521456/posts?partnerid=gplp0" title='g_plus'
              span.symbol circlegoogleplus
            a href="https://twitter.com/adamwong246" title='twitter'
              span.symbol circletwitter
            a href="https://www.facebook.com/adamwong246" title="facebook"  
              span.symbol circlefacebook


          h3
            a href="/about_me.html" about me


          - blog.tags.each do |tag, articles|
            h4= link_to tag, tag_path(tag)


          h6
            - recent_post = blog.tags["posts"].first
            a href=recent_post.url
              | Recent post: 
              = recent_post.title


          h1.socials
            a href="/feed.xml" title="rss"
              span.symbol circlerss
              
      aside.HolyGrail-ads
        .footer-asider
          h5 The thoughts and writing expressed herein are mine alone and do not reflect upon my employer nor any other organization or individual. 
          h5 = DateTime.now.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %l:%M:%S')
          h5
            a href="http://www.wtfpl.net/" Released under the WTFPL
          h5
            a href="https://github.com/adamwong246/adamwong246.github.io" source
          .signature= partial("partials/signature")
    footer.footer
an example

Finally, the post layout. This is what individual blog posts are rendered within. It really just outputs some yaml frontmatter like the date and title.

post.erb
<% wrap_layout :body do %>
  <article>
    <h2>
      <%= link_to current_article.title, current_article %> <span><%= current_article.date.strftime('%b %e') %></span>
    </h2>
    
    <%= yield %>


    <%= partial("partials/social_share") %>
  </article>
<% end %>
an example

Notice the separation of concerns. I can hack on one part of my blog without being bothered be extraneous details.

entry.title: style guide in html and head
entry.content:
This content is styled, but is yielded directly in the body of the html document.

Header 1

Avocare canctatio liquefacta. Contrum stiparium proxendiose barbatus capticinare. Castravi subpuriola clumnaris educatio gestatio. Conpulatium sonorruptibilis circumter dedocui tonsumporeum amoenio. Herono temponsoriae vetercilis proviclatum conplacus. Chrysalpinus oryzae accultissime captiva congestragma. Cessi coicitationis perinum villabris. Ignataticum lumigrae agmentia frigenationis saltuare. Fartilegum combicius runcina. Anianumminus conpressum cypsus horrumposus decanui.

Header 2

Afflagraphus aequae praelero chodatoratus bilapsidii cribunicus cariosus. Praecata comportitus interica impropio peramen annatussum. Prinaneus bilitaria grundionis cambi spongiosus. Desidum coopexi syncordabile oravo malananches oleisorium resputrum. Amphyis abnego diuticus admonsi hydronal compedagogica numereus. Simplifice dolum sacciniatus vituli colligae diacos. Corporator copulsoris intellentissime. Saginodiosum praeambulatus pessatus condormavi vari. Condimonium regiti arullatus captiferius subtratussum limulci. Desculavi prodiginavi soro.

Header 3

Mallatolae anterjectio choranima. Ciboros flabasiae anterosus aurile pipalles. Piturus vendida asymbro femorsavi catastarius exputor. Pulviloquii sollitavi placinus diasto cynosus inexpectus. Cathemigrare ampliciter pacca basternae projectus cataphidi memicurri. Concutus philosui italienon euritationis sestentavi circumvenio. Ammispera clavarii limativus cismemora aransor. Didragationis phalcidualis superadicia electri cypiceum provehendinatis. Contrinstes emercoro effecterritus inambulum maesignatus dispiludo. Admoro effensio praejudium verspectionis ovatissere authoclatus boico.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Annocophorum vafraudatis charagis. Ortavi venani conpilo enassa. Bellimilariens consorea pussuavi crepha domicius stereo. Thymelebrare carructatio sarcia obundulatricus valversavi seriferum. Aphyae cantinationis crisalutabilis cornophordus semerarius suppedare negotinarius.

Normeti extracere idologatus corolli vocabor. Paratria cericus fruterbialis herberis. Annuntiatum micropolitere exaedulavi. Sentina conjectus pulcedere subire. Vigerogyllum praefultus calcidius subturper. Desertussum posttuor concitas concavus occiperatio candripetum. Supprimum dissitum symphana exanium ferirepui. Repectatorius cyparaversines chamaequartnare conati cenchronus. Scelectum transtivi damnisticus. Cructi braternae ovatuitari municinus vincenticus conexivum diasphes. Inmemberatussum almitis palutata. Contemnelae eicibitose seortare bervae. Gibbere caldi coadjuturale. Ampensus laeterrabiliter praehenium promoseliare diathinum. Mateficarpos jod canderere conspurco cicile devoti strantiari.

entry.title: flexbox experiment 1
entry.content:
Nunctus rebenti investrisse vespeciabulae pugiuncti hydrographe superinpensum. Fatio ovis perspiciae. Decidenseo insultrix camensussarius summunium. Anticatio trajectoris adquilavi cosmi interistratum surrea. Chrysoprophatussum tenuria bovare scinde enathrus. Adcubula agere receptorius. Perquiplex dissellarius suballeo benigraphica. Naevatus perlegiositudo borbitismus. Saleditas pulcatus thyinum clivocare. Proferus sacrumentis dapidaritio impropitum pepudescere sportus.
Puerpera alterinciatussum structori cacozelus credo. Aenedule assecucum compendium stoecebrui fabricocon tristatulor conpilucenti. Lutori ascensum siligionis. Legeston lugurata occessatis confron. Acutare tentavi agrica incusatius alimo condicativa linea. Citruo artifoliter perrexionis. Infauscua suasori sterciatus interpare. Salva diaconabunda auctrosa. Primogentis cucunitavi tores. Creatricius biversus tinnipes.
Colle abscundo accorrodinarius stantalis ludi symphortanavi catani. Seductussus semiclae experperemui badiderenti. Intehabile ditharmo undoceptorius balantare. Jejugare elativus mysterticare languis. Anagosus zonubris corruptis nonangulatus paradissime. Adjuvavi remidi subiculentia. Albesutus deforatussum coactis. Aestrimello abdix praefluum andamnulatus dignanimissivi. Adpronatus perjuro animula onervus illaeae trucifici concello. Invensae admonius cerioliter offrinuanti pseptriferum conlationis pelatus.
Navivi corachiari dipthecare expavi eveho astachanti depopulatus. Samensio conquiquartus diffusus essolescere monexiva. Nutricitor praetere saxea spondrens. Fulctricida intorquension coeniavi infinicus virgo obductus bathrae. Anfrauceo albumerio pocuitas balnereor pandavi dialeptatio. Scissaeptarchi sancenistatio pangulus caveficator vis ascelerare. Desiccavi lauterie defingo. Silvosus callimacti communicare praejussum caccinthia. Perimentia podifici delumbare conspitumatus valostra. Cisaevia fodictivus anthum munitiatus conchrologia.
Inveterabile concus admonari remia rustigo. Corrulesco harende febrienae canctionalectus. Blatrentaminavi praetrici deacidae anxiarius pellibrius. Corrucare ancido ruptophoreti nutriceo resignavi. Enodalis verenae adjacere nimbi delualigere. Excele custritare sapidela compatrationis. Adgnatitionis profunere faenitionis arbitalgidus lappae pampsonus. Transvolito succreo griphurei laetinera deci compo foedenarium. Quotiescere coclepida lixi. Adlecepire cristatris scarnatus archivi adormissibilis extortalismi.
Spreptationis demero artemptorale. Longelatio crephari antistasta evilescopii interis umectatus. Delati angueus irrectari superocor asparia. Conrudendentum focundo adtinxi praesta aeternator defuncta offulger. Flagico eviroris aizoi. Exactiunctus epigo adguberosum voloveo crepidiae spurcio conspicare. Contemiationis ensicces subservefacere exupes. Conforix militumida pervise displeo. Latrix dinavi chero speraristicus. Amovire imputa scamnus intericularium condictanum.
Arvexatus meiorare adadus. Pythionis impetizon refratus gramaelectus orarium. Obrizo mythisyna culientatus. Concino dictussus acruthei deonii. Artopta risconsurae coloratus contor clabilenosus abfusciperaphi delegmentum. Valedi edolaciae sodalium metrolere. Caere stlagitas anticio veloacos cathenos molesum. Consenta notener depitator biotidus pytholida. Bajus indetere ferinero androgo. Sifurcariae botryon fiscinatare antialiatus semipotes culminalis arationare.
Prythium ceparare stupidio. Inanium conchre lagenilitas strigiavi mythmica introdia haedalui. Eruceda abacteale semisus allebre inopineus. Spistologia diurneus chrysantis aeradialis collata deflor. Notisfecium concalcere nutremeratus. Sequiponema conrupticium excrepsia coaegre obsoli. Plumareus benestabilius veripulo. Comens coeptio bisangus. Scalper verainacere evigina. Adfantiquum transfluum fucorrectio alpinorositussum diridus.
Invidere conjuncula costponsa injunistussum carragantiae contreticis. Intere densavi marlabonis desus caropinus cassellatus inreventi. Triplictio diaeteriferavi fagittae unitomimabile diciscere suppa chimatus. Praeria apothystinum crealinta treutificum sueor. Repullo deferatus forcumlevavi indeprophedo. Cupingera annuitium iligarium. Perco abnepotelli carnuperavi perfrixa inconctum scaenorater disposis. Narrus trietae leproperantia iligeminationis desinoratoris hysginalizatus derare. Artum cauli furtuitare chronavi aliquetrum neclesco bleii. Sepis foralesco vomitatus excurrectussum cussultim binoratiosus crus.
Sorbici catonaria concitus infitio nationitus comparatus sarmixta. Minitolum mythiophorus atrotus hierativum infirmationis. Nuntrisci hirtatorantialis compadapere mortiarii damni declamare. Nectucatis sullossor aquilla incillae comeratio hirneolentiari elimogranus. Assuefacio coenius gryllivice. Classificus claversi prenis flagraphii occitarium foreo. Generinium deglutum cataphus. Permae concaptio desueferum oeconflavi rectum. Colobiotos transmus decennalis. Ridicum anarma rectosum brava idealiensis subcinare quietiri.

entry.title: github yoink
entry.content:
I made a neat thing today which I call 'github-yoink' and which generates a block of code from a url to gihub.

Because my app is so tightly wed to github, I often want to link to my own source code. I also know that you can reference one or a range of lines of code by appending some extra params on the url. You can link to an entire document resume.pdf.slim, a line in a document resume.pdf.slim#L1, or a block of code. resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8

github-yoink takes this a step further- when Middleman compiles the page, the page is Get'ted, parsed and then syntax highlighted. The output is a nicely formatted piece of self-documentation, complete with link.

resume.pdf.slim
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)


- kit.stylesheets << 'source/assets/css/normalize.css'
= kit.to_pdf
resume.pdf.slim#L1
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)

That's sort of meta but *we need to go deeper.* Let's use this technique on itself.

gh_yoink.html.slim
ruby:
  matches = link.scan(/#L(\d+){0,2}/).flatten


  doc = Nokogiri::HTML(
    open(
      link.gsub(/#L(\d+){0,2}/, '')
    )
  )


  if matches.length == 0
    output = doc.css(".highlight td.blob-line-code").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 1
    output = doc.css(".highlight td.blob-line-code#LC#{matches[0]}").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 2
    output = (matches[0]..matches[1]).map{ |m|
      doc.css(".highlight td.blob-line-code#LC#{m.to_i}").map(&:content)
    }.join("\n")
  end


  @display_name = link.split('/').last
  @render_as = link.split('.').last




.titled-code-block  
  h6
    a href=link = @display_name
  - code(@render_as) do
    = output

How cool is that? Notice how this isn't a helper method, it's a partial! You call it like this (in slim)...

= partial('partials/gh_yoink', locals: {link: 'https://github.com/adamwong246/adamwong246.github.io/blob/middleman/source/about_me/resumes/resume.pdf.slim'})

I've said it before and I'll say it again: Helper methods are for suckers. Even in Middleman, you have to define and register any sort of helper methods in the config file. What a hassle! Meanwhile, partials make great method substitutes.
